results.deck: Just Dance 3 is Ubisoft's third main installment in the worldwide hit Just Dance series. In keeping with series tradition, despite the name obviously suggesting it, the game does not include the Lady GaGa song "Just Dance".
results.name: Just Dance 3

results.deck: Take on the role of Deadmund as he battles his way through hordes of undead skeletons using his sword & shield, bow & arrow, and throwing stars in this PlayStation Move-exclusive game.
results.name: Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest

results.deck: Sly, Bentley, and Murray must travel back in time to save the Cooper dynasty from being erased throughout all of history. Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time is the fourth title in the Sly Cooper franchise.
results.name: Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time

results.deck: Remastered HD versions of God of War: Chains of Olympus and God of War: Ghost of Sparta for the PlayStation 3.
results.name: God of War: Origins Collection

results.deck: 2011 edition of the 2K's NBA franchise.
results.name: NBA 2K12

results.deck: The sequel to the Kinect launch game MotionSports, MotionSports: Adrenaline is an extreme sports game by Ubisoft, supporting Kinect and Move.
results.name: MotionSports Adrenaline

results.deck: Hot Shots Golf comes to PlayStation Vita as a launch title.
results.name: Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational

results.deck: Top Gun: Hard Lock is a game adaption of the famous 1980 Top Gun movie.
results.name: Top Gun: Hard Lock

results.deck: A follow-up of sorts to X-Blades, Blades of Time reintroduces minimally-dressed treasure hunter Ayumi, now with a more realistic look and the ability to record and rewind time.
results.name: Blades of Time

results.deck: Champion Jockey is the latest Tecmo/Koei horse racing release.
results.name: Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey and Gallop Racer

results.deck: From Vanillaware Ltd., developers of Muramasa: The Demon Blade and Odin Sphere, Dragon's Crown is a fantasy themed co-op beat-'em-up.
results.name: Dragon's Crown

results.deck: Carnival Island is a PlayStation Move title where you are able to participate in traditional carnival games and attractions.
results.name: Carnival Island

results.deck: A fantasy Tower Defense game.
results.name: Defenders of Ardania

results.deck: The new dancing game from Sony, Everybody Dance utilized the Move Controller.
results.name: Everybody Dance

results.deck: A Role Playing game in which a war between orcs, goblins and humans is told from the perspective of one of the last surviving orcs.
results.name: Of Orcs and Men

results.deck: The 2011 official video game of the world's most famous cycle race.
results.name: Tour de France 2011

results.deck: A PS3 exclusive title based on the anime Saint Seiya.
results.name: Saint Seiya: Sanctuary Battle

results.deck: An action-adventure game about a pirate who tries to avenge the death of his family.
results.name: Vendetta: Curse of Raven's Cry

results.deck: Kevin VanDam Big Bass Challenge is a fishing game.
results.name: Kevin VanDam Big Bass Challenge

results.deck: Dutch version of the popular Buzz! franchise for the PS3. Questions based on Dutch history, culture, sports and more.
results.name: Buzz! De slimste van Nederland

results.deck: Yet another motion controlled dancing game for the Wii, Kinect, and PS Move. Do battle with up to 8 players in 4 different game modes.
results.name: Let's Dance with Mel B

results.deck: A dating sim spin off of the original Steins;Gate.
results.name: Steins;Gate: Hiyoku Renri no Darling

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2012 is the latest entry in the Cabela's hunting franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2012

results.deck: Dr. Blowhole returns again in this Kinect-focused cartoon game from THQ.
results.name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns Again!

results.deck: The newest installment of the Naruto fighting games. Featuring over 70 characters from Part I & Part II.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations

results.deck: A Playstation Home exclusive game by The Odd Gentlemen, creators of The Misadventures of P.B. Winterbottom.
results.name: Slap Happy Sam

results.deck: After the Empress is killed, her most loyal bodyguard, Corvo, becomes the prime suspect, and must track down those who murdered his charge and betrayed him in order to enact his bloody revenge.
results.name: Dishonored

results.deck: A new melee combat style game meant to appeal to individuals who aren't fans of WWE wrestling products. It was officially cancelled after THQ's demise in 2013.
results.name: WWE Brawl

results.deck: A standalone update to Marvel vs Capcom 3 featuring new modes, characters, stages, an enhanced online experience, and large-scale rebalancing of core systems and the existing roster.
results.name: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3

results.deck: GoldenEye 007: Reloaded is a first-person shooter for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 based on the 2010 Nintendo Wii shooter GoldenEye 007, which is based on the 1997 Nintendo 64 shooter of the same name, which is based on the 1995 James Bond movie GoldenEye.
results.name: GoldenEye 007 Reloaded

results.deck: BEN 10 Galactic Racing presents the ultimate racing experience! While Ben makes use of his Ultimatrix to transform into his alien forms mid-race, every other character utilizes their unique special abilities, based on powers straight out of the television series, to affect the outcome of each race.
results.name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing

results.deck: This deliberately ridiculous third-person action game stars Juliet Starling, a zombie-slaying cheerleader who's almost as handy with a chainsaw as she is with a pair of pom-poms.
results.name: Lollipop Chainsaw

results.deck: This collection pack contains a HD version of Tekken Tag Tournament, Tekken Tag Tournament 2 Prologue, and the 3D CGI movie, Tekken Blood Vengeance.
results.name: Tekken Hybrid

results.deck: A PS3 port of the first four episodes of the Japanese murder mystery sound novel Umineko no Naku Koro ni.
results.name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo to Suiri no Rinbukyoku

results.deck: As pilot James Logan you must survive the frigid Alaskan wilderness by any means necessary.
results.name: Cabela's Survival: Shadows of Katmai

results.deck: Return to Pandora as part of a new group of ragtag Vault Hunters in this sequel to the 2009 first-person "role-playing shooter" Borderlands, now with new crazy enemies, new crazy character classes, and even crazier weapons.
results.name: Borderlands 2

results.deck: Port Royale 3 is the next entry in the Port Royale franchise. Like its predecessors, Port Royale 3 takes place in the 17th century, and is a pirate themed strategy game.
results.name: Port Royale 3: Pirates & Merchants

results.deck: Happy Feet Two is a video game based on the animated film of the same name. It was developed by KMM Studios and publised by WB Games.
results.name: Happy Feet Two

results.deck: Shoot your way across the solar system to level up and collect new loot in this multiplayer-focused first-person shooter from Bungie and Activision.
results.name: Destiny

results.deck: Grand Slam Tennis' first foray into HD, this update to 2009's Grand Slam Tennis for the Wii brings with it more realistic graphics, an expanded roster and Total Racquet Control.
results.name: Grand Slam Tennis 2

results.deck: Get up and Dance is a dance video game for the Wii and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Get Up and Dance

results.deck: A fighting game from Konami and Arc System works, based on the manga Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan.
results.name: Nurarihyon no Mago: Hyakki Ryouran Taisen

results.deck: A third-person action RPG set in the popular tabletop role-playing universe of The Dark Eye.
results.name: The Dark Eye: Demonicon

results.deck: An expansion to Dynasty Warriors 7, this Xtreme Legends title offers three new playable characters, new weapons and move sets for existing characters, and additional modes and stages.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 7: Xtreme Legends

results.deck: A reboot of the FIFA Street series, developed by the core FIFA team at EA Canada.
results.name: FIFA Street

results.deck: The first full-on expansion for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Knights of the Nine

results.deck: The latest installment in EA Sports' FIFA series, featuring updated rosters, technical improvements, a more robust feature set for Support Your Club, and a new First Touch mechanic.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 13

results.deck: Developed by Dontnod Entertainment, Remember Me is a futuristic game set in Neo-Paris. The protagonist Nilin is up against a tyrant company Memorize with the technology to manipulate peoples memory to their will. It is up to Nilin and her friends to fight against Memorize to break the bind it has on society.
results.name: Remember Me

results.deck: A role-playing camping, fishing, and hunting adventure.
results.name: Outdoors Unlimited

results.deck: The sequel to last years dance game for the kids is back. With 40 more songs but now on all three platforms.
results.name: Just Dance Kids 2

results.deck: Yet another updated version of "BlazBlue Continuum Shift", this time for the PS Vita, PS3 & Xbox 360. Features a new playable character and additional features.
results.name: BlazBlue Continuum Shift Extend

results.deck: Persona 4 Arena is an Arc System Works-developed fighting game with an Atlus-developed story mode that serves as the official sequel to both Persona 3 and Persona 4.
results.name: Persona 4 Arena

results.deck: The fifth entry in the Ryu ga Gotoku/Yakuza series, overhauled in terms of style and game mechanics.
results.name: Yakuza 5

results.deck: An air combat game set amidst the biggest battles of World War II.
results.name: Combat Wings: The Great Battles of WWII

results.deck: Onechanbara Z: Kagura is the sequel to D3's Onechanbara: Bikini Samurai Squad. Kagura and Saaya are on a quest to kill the protagonists from the previous game for creating zombies all over the world
results.name: Onechanbara Z: Kagura

results.deck: A One Piece game in the style of Dynasty Warriors. Play as the fearless Monkey D. Luffy and crew as they venture across the Grand Line in order to achieve Luffy's dream of finding Gol D. Roger's fabled treasure, the One Piece, and becoming the Pirate King.
results.name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors

results.deck: inFamous: Festival of Blood is a stand-alone downloadable game that sees Cole MacGrath, the electric superhuman, get a whole new set of superpowers when he is bitten by a vampire, whom he must track down and slay before he transforms fully into a creature of the night himself.
results.name: inFamous: Festival of Blood

results.deck: An enhanced PlayStation 3 port of Namco Bandai's Wii JRPG, Tales of Graces. It is the sole version of the game released in North America.
results.name: Tales of Graces F

results.deck: Dead or Alive 5 is the seventh entry in the Dead or Alive fighting game franchise, introducing a new visual style, new game mechanics, and highly interactive stages.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5

results.deck: 5pb developed and published this visual novel for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Dunamis 15

results.deck: Based on the TV series, NCIS has the player investigating mysterious crimes on behalf of the U.S. Navy.
results.name: NCIS

results.deck: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence is a game based on the series of the same name on Cartoon Network.
results.name: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence

results.deck: This slightly budget-priced game is a NASCAR branded Blur knockoff from Activision.
results.name: NASCAR Unleashed

results.deck: A collection of art lessons, drawing tools and minigames designed for use with the uDraw Game Tablet.
results.name: uDraw Studio: Instant Artist

results.deck: Black Bean's rally racing game returns for the 2011 season.
results.name: WRC 2: FIA World Rally Championship

results.deck: A fantasy themed action game developed by Acquire.
results.name: Clan of Champions

results.deck: Dance game for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 that have Kinect and Move support.
results.name: Dance Magic

results.deck: The first game to bear the Jane name in a decade, discarding the realism of the original Jane's Combat Simulation titles.
results.name: JASF: Jane's Advanced Strike Fighters

results.deck: Dance and sing to the songs from the classic movie musical Grease in this release for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Grease Dance

results.deck: A kid-oriented motion controlled mini-game collection from Cabela's. Players attend summer camp for a week and compete in 8 different camp-style games.
results.name: Cabela's Adventure Camp

results.deck: An action-RPG developed by the Prinny Team of Nippon Ichi Software, Inc. exclusively for PlayStation 3.
results.name: The Witch and the Hundred Knight

results.deck: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is the spiritual successor to 2010's "War for Cybertron", and depicts the climax of the war between the Autobots and the Decepticons, culminating in the destruction of the Transformer homeworld of Cybertron.
results.name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron

results.deck: A Marvel themed game for the UDraw tablet.
results.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat

results.deck: Majikoi is a visual novel developed by Minato Soft that focuses around the life of Naoe Yamato and the strong "samurai girls" that surround him.
results.name: Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai!

results.deck: ABC's TV show about fitness, abuse, and humiliation continues its march across consoles.
results.name: Wipeout 2

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 13 is EA Sports' golf sim for the 2012 season.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 13

results.deck: A console title based on the popular party game which utilises THQ's uDraw tablet.
results.name: Pictionary: Ultimate Edition

results.deck: A kart racing game featuring fourteen characters from DreamWorks movies.
results.name: DreamWorks Super Star Kartz

results.deck: Released to coincide with, but not based on or tying into Men in Black III, Alien Crisis sees players shooting aliens and saving the world as Peter Delacoeur, a former thief and now an MIB agent.
results.name: Men in Black: Alien Crisis

results.deck: Announced at NYCC 2011, The Amazing Spider-Man game is an original story told after the 2012 movie. The console versions are developed by Beenox, the company that created Shattered Dimensions and Edge of Time while the DS version was developed by Other Ocean Studios.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man

results.deck: HD remakes of the first three Devil May Cry games, released this time for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Devil May Cry HD Collection

results.deck: A game with quizzes, puzzle games and have an explorer mode where players compete to claim parts of the world with mini-games.
results.name: National Geographic Challenge!

results.deck: Sony's trivia series takes a second sojourn into musical territory with Ultimate Music Quiz.
results.name: Buzz!: The Ultimate Music Quiz

results.deck: This enhanced remake of To Heart 2 also comes with the content of To Heart 2 Another Days built right in.
results.name: To Heart 2 DX Plus

results.deck: This Evangelion slots game is so ultra hot that it requires two exclamation points.
results.name: Ultra Hot!! Pachi Game Spirit Vol. 2 CR Evangelion

results.deck: Nobunaga takes his ambitious online in this Nova chapter.
results.name: Nobunaga's Ambition Online: Chapter Nova

results.deck: The Dokodemo Issho franchise continues in this PlayStation 3 minigame collection.
results.name: TORO! Let's Party!

results.deck: The classic Japanese board game comes to the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Tencho no Igo

results.deck: Konami's long-running Power Pro baseball series continues for the 2011 season.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Baseball 2011

results.deck: The otome series comes to PlayStation 3.
results.name: Hiiro no Kakera Aizouban ~Akaneiro no Tsuioku~

results.deck: This updated version of Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou comes with... a Power-Up Kit?
results.name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou with Power-Up Kit

results.deck: Kids can sing too, you know!
results.name: SingStar Junior

results.deck: The third game in the Class of Heroes series.
results.name: Class of Heroes 3

results.deck: Hakuoki: Stories of the Shinsengumi is a port of the original Hakuoki game, bundled together with the Hakuoki Zuisouroku side story.
results.name: Hakuoki: Stories of the Shinsengumi

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto V is a modern crime epic featuring a crew of three protagonists rolling through the diverse landscape of the fictional state of San Andreas.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto V

results.deck: This shogi simulator is available for the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Shogi: Fuuum Ryouko Raiden

results.deck: Ashita no Joe gets its own pachinko game in this astounding PlayStation 3 release.
results.name: Bikkuri Pachinko: Ashita no Joe KYORAKU Collection Vol. 1

results.deck: My Fitness Coach appears on the PlayStation 3 with Move compatibility and a new "Club" subtitle.
results.name: My Fitness Coach: Club

results.deck: If you're playing a virtual slot machine video game on your PlayStation 3, it might as well be one that features popular professional wrestler Antonio Inoki, right?
results.name: Slotter Chou Mania: Antonio Inoki ga Genki ni Suru Pachi-Slot Ki

results.deck: This updated version of Janline was released for the PlayStation 3 in Japan.
results.name: Janline R
